name: Thuban
description:
A simple platformer. You have crash-landed on Thuban Island, try to get home by reaching the summit of mount Thuban!

Controlls:

Move - left jostick, A and D or left and right

Jump - A (Controller), Spacebar or Z

Dash - X (Controller and keyboard), Shift or Enter

Interact - Y (Controller), C, W or up arrow
